TopicTitle: DarkTech Dark Energy Ships And Ship Systems 1.0.2

Articles.Content:
This is the mod I am developing right now. I will have this run on standard game mechanics until I learn to code plugins for my mod. In this thread I will read your suggestions and consider changes to make, and you can see the models on sketchfab to see how they are coming along.

Here is the link on CurseForge:

[http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/231718-darktech-wip-parts-and-ship-systems-pack](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/231718-darktech-wip-parts-and-ship-systems-pack)

I have it experimental because I have nothing really set in stone about how this mod will be made.

Here are the 2 engines I have so far:

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

DT-808 - The lander engine

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

DT-M18 - The orbital and lightweight lander engine.

I am going to update these projects with their cleaner counterparts, the ones with textures, not glitch.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T15:09:12Z" title="06/23/2015 03:09  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by Avetho**
